info.title: AnswerAI Complete API
info.description: Complete API documentation for all AnswerAI services

apiHost.description: The API host to be replaced with your endpoint (can be set via environment variable)

tags.name: document-store
tags.description: Operations for managing document stores, collections, and documents

post.description: Creates a new document store with the provided details

get.description: Retrieves a list of all document stores
Retrieves details of a specific document store by its ID

put.description: Updates the details of a specific document store by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a document store by its ID

post.description: Process loading & chunking operation of document from loader

loaderId.description: ID of the loader (e.g., plainText, pdf, etc.)

example.text:
Text to be split

This is another chunk

splitterName.description: Display name of the text splitter

get.description: Get file chunks for a specific loader in a document store

404.description: Document store or loader not found

put.description: Update a specific file chunk in a document store

404.description: Document store, loader, or chunk not found

delete.description: Delete a specific file chunk in a document store

404.description: Document store, loader, or chunk not found

post.description: Query the vector store for similar documents

query.example: What is the capital of France?
What is the capital of France?

delete.description: Delete vector store data for a specific document store

docId.description: Document ID to use existing configuration

replaceExisting.description: Whether to replace existing document loader with the new upserted chunks. However this does not delete the existing embeddings in the vector store

createNewDocStore.description: Whether to create a new document store

docStore.description: Only when createNewDocStore is true, pass in the new document store configuration

name.description: Name of the new document store to be created

description.description: Description of the new document store to be created

post.summary: Re-process and upsert all documents in document store
post.description: Re-process and upsert all existing documents in document store

delete.summary: Delete specific document loader and associated chunks from document store
delete.description: Delete specific document loader and associated chunks from document store. This does not delete data from vector store.

200.description: Successfully deleted loader from document store

post.description: Create a new assistant with the provided details

get.description: Retrieve a list of all assistants
Retrieve a specific assistant by ID

put.description: Update the details of an existing assistant

400.description: The specified ID is invalid or body is missing

parameters.name: isDeleteBoth
parameters.description: Whether to delete both the assistant and its associated resources

post.description: Upload a file to create a new attachment

purpose.description: The intended purpose of the file

get.description: Get information about a specific attachment

parameters.name: attachment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the attachment to retrieve

parameters.name: attachment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the attachment to delete

get.description: Download the content of a specific attachment

parameters.name: attachment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the attachment to download

get.description: Retrieve all chat messages for a specific chatflow.

delete.description: Delete all chat messages for a specific chatflow.

post.description: Create a new chatflow with the provided details

get.description: Retrieve a list of all chatflows
Retrieve a specific chatflow by ID

put.description: Update the details of an existing chatflow

400.description: The specified ID is invalid or body is missing

get.description: Retrieve a chatflow using an API key

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key associated with the chatflow

400.description: The specified API key is invalid

post.description: Create new feedback for a specific chat flow.

get.summary: List all chat message feedbacks for a chatflow
get.description: Retrieve all feedbacks for a chatflow

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter feedbacks starting from this date (optional)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter feedbacks up to this date (optional)

404.description: Feedback with the specified ID was not found

post.summary: Create a new lead in a chatflow
post.description: Create a new lead associated with a specific chatflow

get.summary: Get all leads for a specific chatflow
get.description: Retrieve all leads associated with a specific chatflow
Ping the server to check if it is running

post.description: Create a new prediction for a specific chatflow

question.description: Question to ask during the prediction process

get.description: Retrieve a list of all tools
Retrieve a specific tool by ID

put.description: Update a specific tool by ID

400.description: Invalid ID or request body provided

delete.description: Delete a specific tool by ID

get.description: Retrieve all upsert history records with optional filters

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Chatflow ID to filter records by

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order of the results (ascending or descending)

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter records from this start date (inclusive)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter records until this end date (inclusive)

patch.description: Soft delete upsert history records by IDs

ids.description: List of upsert history record IDs to delete

get.description: Retrieve a list of all environment variables

put.description: Update a specific environment variable by ID

400.description: Invalid ID or request body provided

delete.description: Delete a specific environment variable by ID

post.description: Upsert vector embeddings of documents in a chatflow

stopNodeId.description: In cases when you have multiple vector store nodes, you can specify the node ID to store the vectors

overrideConfig.description: The configuration to override the default vector upsert settings (optional)

id.description: Unique identifier for the document store

description.example: Store for all product documentation and specifications

loaders.description: Loaders associated with the document store, stored as JSON string

whereUsed.description: Places where the document store is used, stored as JSON string

vectorStoreConfig.description: Configuration for the vector store, stored as JSON string

embeddingConfig.description: Configuration for the embedding, stored as JSON string

recordManagerConfig.description: Configuration for the record manager, stored as JSON string

createdDate.description: Date and time when the document store was created

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the document store was last updated

pageContent.example: This is the content of the page.

id.description: Unique identifier for the file chunk

pageContent.example: This document outlines the requirements for our new product...

id.description: Unique identifier for the document store loader

size.description: Size of the file in bytes

id.description: Unique identifier for the document store loader

numSkipped.description: Number of vectors skipped (not added, deleted, or updated)

id.description: Unique identifier for the document store loader

instructions.example: You are a helpful assistant, do your best to answer question and query
You are a helpful assistant, do your best to answer question and query

object.description: The object type, which is always "attachment"

created_at.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) for when the attachment was created

purpose.description: The intended purpose of the file

bytes.description: The size of the file in bytes

status.description: The status of the file processing

content_type.description: The MIME type of the file

id.description: The ID of the deleted attachment

object.description: The object type, which is always "attachment.deleted"

content.example: Hello, how can I help you today?
